&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @bilingual tinyint, @l char(1), @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @templatePrint char(1), @templateFile varchar(128) if @@form in ('030', '040', '130', '140') select @bilingual = 1, @l = 'V' else select @bilingual = 0, @l = @@language select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @templatePrint = replace(rtrim(val), '''', '') from options where name = 'm_mau_in_ktth'
if @@form in ('010', '020', '030', '040') begin select @stt_rec as text into #$keys select @ngay_ct = ngay_ct from c29$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec exec rs_rptPrintGLTranExport 'HD9', '29' ,@ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '', '', @bilingual, @@language, @@userID, @@admin, default end else begin select ltrim(so_ct) as so_ct, t_ps_no, t_ps_no_nt, t_ps_co, t_ps_co_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, t_ps_no, @l) as t_ps_no_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, t_ps_no_nt, @l) as t_ps_no_nt_in_word, case when @bilingual = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, t_ps_no, 'E') else '' end as t_ps_no_in_word2, case when @bilingual = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, t_ps_no_nt, 'E') else '' end as t_ps_no_nt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, t_ps_co, @@language) as t_ps_co_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, t_ps_co_nt, @@language) as t_ps_co_nt_in_word, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) where stt_rec = @stt_rec
declare @key varchar(128) select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintGLTran @@language, @key, 'd29$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual
if @templatePrint = '2' or (@templatePrint = '3' and exists(select 1 from d29$$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec and ma_kh <> '')) select @templateFile = case when @@form in ('110', '120') then 'GLTran_02' when @@form in ('130', '140') then 'GLTran_02BI' else '' end else select @templateFile = ''
if isnull(@templateFile, '') <> '' begin select @templateFile as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end end end
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;
